homepage.title: Tesla Battery Health Check - Get Instant Results in 30 Seconds | batterycert.com
homepage.description: Check your Tesla battery health instantly with our free assessment tool. Get verified battery degradation data, capacity analysis, and optional PDF certificates for buying or selling your Tesla.
homepage.og_title: Tesla Battery Health Check - Instant Results in 30 Seconds
homepage.og_description: Get instant, verified Tesla battery health assessments. Perfect for buying, selling, or knowing your Tesla's true condition.

service.name: Tesla Battery Health Check
service.description: Get instant, verified Tesla battery health assessments. Perfect for buying, selling, or knowing your Tesla's true condition.

problem_section.title: Battery Replacement =
problem_section.subtitle: Buyers, don't get scammed with hidden battery issues
problem_section.video_description: Watch this video to understand the common scam. batterycert.com helps you avoid it.

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: Securely connect via Tesla's official OAuth. We never see your credentials - you authenticate directly with Tesla.

analyze.title: Analyze
analyze.description: Our system instantly analyzes your battery data using Tesla's API and calculates degradation percentage.

certificate.title: Optional: Certificate
certificate.description: Get a verified PDF certificate with QR code for buyers to verify. Valid for 3 months. Single £8 fee.

cta_section.title: Ready to Check Your Tesla Battery?
cta_section.subtitle: Join thousands of Tesla owners who trust batterycert.com for accurate, instant battery health reports.

footer.copyright: © 2025 batterycert.com. Built for Tesla owners and buyers in the name of fair play.

meta.not_found_description: The requested Tesla battery certificate could not be found.
meta.title: {vehicleName} - Tesla Battery Certificate - batterycert.com
meta.description: View the Tesla battery health certificate for {vehicleName} with detailed degradation analysis, capacity data, and verification QR code.
meta.default_description: View your Tesla battery health certificate with detailed degradation analysis, capacity data, and verification QR code.
meta.keywords: Tesla battery certificate, battery health report, battery degradation certificate, Tesla battery verification

not_found.title: Certificate Not Found
not_found.description: The certificate ID "{id}" was not found or may have expired.

fraud_protection.title: Fraud Protection Verified
fraud_protection.description: This certificate is tamper-proof and directly connected to Tesla's official systems. The QR code below allows instant verification of authenticity. Buyers can trust this assessment is genuine and accurate.

certificate_locked.title: Certificate Locked
certificate_locked.description: Complete your payment above to unlock the full verified certificate with:

verification_footer.verification_description: This certificate can be verified using QR code or certificate ID:

certificate_display.title: Battery Health Report from Tesla Data
certificate_display.summary_excellent: This {vehicleName} demonstrates excellent battery health with {degradation}% degradation. The battery is performing exceptionally well for its usage. Current capacity of {currentCapacity} kWh from an original {originalCapacity} kWh. This vehicle represents an excellent purchase opportunity with minimal battery-related risks.
certificate_display.summary_good: This {vehicleName} demonstrates good battery health with {degradation}% degradation. The battery is performing well for its usage. Current capacity of {currentCapacity} kWh from an original {originalCapacity} kWh. This vehicle represents a good purchase opportunity with normal wear patterns.
certificate_display.summary_fair: This {vehicleName} demonstrates fair battery health with {degradation}% degradation. The battery is performing adequately for its usage. Current capacity of {currentCapacity} kWh from an original {originalCapacity} kWh. This vehicle shows higher than average degradation and should be considered carefully.

certificate_payment.certificate_description: This certificate requires payment to unlock the full verified report.
certificate_payment.pricing_description: Get your official Tesla battery health certificate with verification QR code and fraud protection.
certificate_payment.secure_payment: Secure payment powered by Stripe • Instant access after payment • Email receipt included

gdpr.title: We respect your privacy
gdpr.message: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. Your Tesla data is processed securely and never shared with third parties.

certificate_promo.title: Get Your Official Certificate
certificate_promo.subtitle: Turn your results into a verified document that increases your Tesla's value
certificate_promo.features: 💎 Instant download • 🔒 Secure payment • 📄 Valid for 3 months
